entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of wet snow. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of wet snow late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023
